section.name: Project Information
section.description: This section contains general project info for this project.

setting.name: Project Name
setting.description: The name of the current project the system is processing.

setting.name: Project Creation Date
setting.description: The date this project was created.

setting.name: Valid Component Type List
setting.description: A list of valid component types that are acceptable to use with this project type.

setting.name: Project Auxiliaries List
setting.description: A list of valid auxiliaries that are used at the project level (project-wide).

setting.name: Default Auxiliaries List
setting.description: A list of valid auxiliary components that are automatically installed for this type of project.

setting.name: Optional Auxiliaries List
setting.description: A list of valid optional auxiliary components that are acceptable to use with this project type but are not automatically installed.

setting.name: Component List
setting.description: A list of components installed in this project.

setting.name: Auxiliary List
setting.description: A list of auxiliary components installed in this project.

setting.name: Project Component Binding Order List
setting.description: A list of components that are used in this project in the order they are to be found in the publication.
